nodes.text: Hazard Squadron was a starfighter squadron set up by the Galactic Republic to protect starship convoys transporting materials to Bromlarch as part of the Mid Rim Cooperation motion. It was led by Daneska Varbarós in Naboo's royal starship. The squadron included Sabé, who served as Hazard One, Captain Tonra as Hazard Two, and the Jedi Master Depa Billaba as Hazard Three, using her Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor.
